languages.text: "Нет, нет... разве ты не видел, как Караэль говорил со мной? Наклоны головы, интонация... Он действительно жаждет моего возврата. Возможно, Опустошительная буря... еще может быть воскрешена". {n}Маражай задумчиво смотрит куда-то в сторону, погрузившись в размышления.{/n}

"No, no... Did you not see how Kharael spoke to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He yearns for my return. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет, нет... разве ты не видел, как Караэль говорил со мной? Наклоны головы, интонация... Он действительно жаждет моего возврата. Возможно, Опустошительная буря... еще может быть воскрешена". {n}Маражай задумчиво смотрит куда-то в сторону, погрузившись в размышления.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "No, no... Have you not seen the way Kharael was talking to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He does yearn for my comeback. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No, no... Have you not seen the way Kharael was talking to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He does yearn for my comeback. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No, no... Did you not see how Kharael spoke to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He yearns for my return. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No, no... Did you not see how Kharael spoke to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He yearns for my return. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nein, nein ... Habt Ihr nicht gesehen, wie Kharael mit mir gesprochen hat? Wie er seinen Kopf neigt, sein Tonfall ... Er sehnt sich nach meiner Rückkehr. Vielleicht kann der plündernde Sturm ... doch noch wiedergeboren werden." {n}Marazhai starrt gedankenverloren in die Ferne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, no... Did you not see how Kharael spoke to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He yearns for my return. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein, nein ... Habt Ihr nicht gesehen, wie Kharael mit mir gesprochen hat? Wie er seinen Kopf neigt, sein Tonfall ... Er sehnt sich nach meiner Rückkehr. Vielleicht kann der plündernde Sturm ... doch noch wiedergeboren werden." {n}Marazhai starrt gedankenverloren in die Ferne.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “不，并不是……你没看到卡瑞尔是怎么和我说话的吗？他的头倾斜的方式，还有他的语气……他渴望我回去。也许狂风阴谋团……依然可以卷土重来。”{n}玛拉斋望向一边，陷入沉思。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, no... Did you not see how Kharael spoke to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He yearns for my return. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不，并不是……你没看到卡瑞尔是怎么和我说话的吗？他的头倾斜的方式，还有他的语气……他渴望我回去。也许狂风阴谋团……依然可以卷土重来。”{n}玛拉斋望向一边，陷入沉思。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Non, non... Il n'y a qu'à voir la façon dont Kharael m'a parlé. L'inclinaison de sa tête, son ton... Il veut sincèrement que je revienne. Peut-être que la Tempête ravageuse... a encore une chance de renaître. » {n}Marazhai regarde dans le vide, pensif.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, no... Did you not see how Kharael spoke to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He yearns for my return. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non, non... Il n'y a qu'à voir la façon dont Kharael m'a parlé. L'inclinaison de sa tête, son ton... Il veut sincèrement que je revienne. Peut-être que la Tempête ravageuse... a encore une chance de renaître. » {n}Marazhai regarde dans le vide, pensif.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No, no... ¿has visto cómo me hablaba Kharael? La inclinación de su cabeza, el tono... Anhela mi regreso. Tal vez la Tempestad Asoladora... pueda renacer». {n}Marazhai aparta la mirada, absorto en sus pensamientos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, no... Did you not see how Kharael spoke to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He yearns for my return. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No, no... ¿has visto cómo me hablaba Kharael? La inclinación de su cabeza, el tono... Anhela mi regreso. Tal vez la Tempestad Asoladora... pueda renacer». {n}Marazhai aparta la mirada, absorto en sus pensamientos.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ち、違う…カラエルの態度を見てなかったのか？頭の下げ方、声色…俺様の帰還を切望しているんだ。きっと略奪の嵐を…蘇えらせることができるんだ」{n}マラズハイは物思いに沈んで目をそらす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, no... Did you not see how Kharael spoke to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He yearns for my return. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ち、違う…カラエルの態度を見てなかったのか？頭の下げ方、声色…俺様の帰還を切望しているんだ。きっと略奪の嵐を…蘇えらせることができるんだ」{n}マラズハイは物思いに沈んで目をそらす。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır, hayır. Kharael'in benimle nasıl konuştuğunu görmedin mi? Başını eğişi, ses tonu... Geri dönmemi istiyor. Müfteris Kasırga gerçekten de yeniden doğabilir belki." {n}Marazhai, düşünceler içinde gözlerini yanda bir yerlere dikiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, no... Did you not see how Kharael spoke to me? The incline of his head, the tone... He yearns for my return. Perhaps the Reaving Tempest... can still be reborn." {n}Marazhai stares off to the side, immersed in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, hayır. Kharael'in benimle nasıl konuştuğunu görmedin mi? Başının eğilimi, ses tonu... Geri dönmemi istiyor. Belki Müfteris Kasırga gerçekten de yeniden doğabilir." {n}Marazhai gözlerini, düşünceler içinde yan tarafta bir yere dikiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
